summary.span: 将指定的 XPS 文档同步写入目标 或 。

span.span: Synchronously writes a specified XPS document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 类具有单数名称，但 可以是一 组或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将 源中的元素添加到 目标或中的元素集 。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 此 `Write` 方法将 reserialize 指定的 XPS 文档，该文档将删除 [XML 纸张规范](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-388.htm)不需要保留的中的所有内容。This `Write` method will reserialize the specified XPS document, which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-388.htm). Reserialization 还将从标记中删除所有扩展 ，包括任何扩展的 XPS 内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended XPS content. 按照设计，此 `Write` 方法不会引发 事件。By design, this `Write` method does not raise the event.

summary.span: 将指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档同步写入目标 或 。

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `notificationLevel` 禁用，则会将 序列化的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档复制到目标 或 创建的 。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . `notificationLevel`启用后，第一 次反序列化该文档，接下来，重新它，然后在每个页面输出时将其写入目标并发送进度通知。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 尽管 类具有单数名称，但 可以是一 组或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将 源中的元素添加到 目标中的元素序列 或 。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果 `notificationLevel` 指定为 ，则仅在对文档进行序列化而不打印时才生成通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收通知，文档必须为 reserialized。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 当文档 reserialized 中的所有内容 不需要由 [XML 纸张规范保留时， (XPS) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 会被删除。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. Reserialization 还将从标记中删除所有扩展 ，包括任何扩展 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果 `notificationLevel` 指定了，则将 不会 reserialized 文档，并且即使在打印时也将保留任何扩展内容。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 按照设计，此 方法不会调用 事件。By design this method does not call the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 类具有单数名称，但 可以是一 组或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将 源中的元素添加到 目标或中的元素集 。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 此 方法将 reserialize 指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档，该文档将删除 [XML 纸张规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)不需要保留的中的所有内容。This method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). Reserialization 还将从标记中删除所有扩展 ，包括任何扩展 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 按照设计，此 方法不会调用 事件。By design this method does not call the event.

summary.span: 将带有通知选项的指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档异步写入目标 或 中。

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `notificationLevel` 禁用，则会将 序列化的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档复制到目标 或 创建的 。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . `notificationLevel`启用后，第一 次反序列化该文档，接下来，重新它，然后在每个页面输出时将其写入目标并发送进度通知。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 尽管 类具有单数名称，但 可以是一 组或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将 源中的元素添加到 目标中的元素序列 或 。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果 `notificationLevel` 指定为 ，则仅在对文档进行序列化而不打印时才生成通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收通知，文档必须为 reserialized。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 当 reserialized 文档时，将 删除不需要由 [XML 纸张规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 保留的中的所有内容。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. Reserialization 还将从标记中删除所有扩展 ，包括任何扩展 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果 `notificationLevel` 指定了，则将 不会 reserialized 文档，并且即使在打印时也将保留任何扩展内容。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 按照设计，此 方法不会调用 事件。By design this method does not call the event.
